summary: The U.S. arm of the cryptocurrency exchange giant named Eric Segal as its interim CFO.
title: Binance.US Bumps Brian Shroder to CEO; CFO Departs
content: Binance.US has promoted Brian Shroder to CEO, the U.S. arm of the cryptocurrency exchange announced on Friday.
